title: Fighting forest fires with power pumps
creator_credit: Lawrence Cherry, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An instructional film on the use of power pumps in forest fire-fighting. Portable equipment, the operation of a gasoline pump, the efficient deployment of men, precautions in handling hose and equipment, and effective use of varying pressures and volumes of water are demonstrated.
creator_credit_for_label: Lawrence Cherry, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
